tags: why do I sound like I'm writing to some weird phandom magazine ugh
also I wish I shouldn't have to mention this but this is my personal opinion and you can have yours so peace out
summary:
Since I did this last year, why not make it a tradition... Here are my top-5 most memorable phan moments of 2018: 
1. Seeing...
body:
Since I did this last year, why not make it a tradition… Here are my top-5 most memorable phan moments of 2018:

1. Seeing Interactive Introverts

I mean, how could something else be on the number one spot? I didn’t have a vip ticket, but still, I did see Dan and Phil live. To this day I remember how weird that felt - I couldn’t grasp my mind around the fact that they were there, breathing the same air and I knew exactly what they were doing at that exact moment. I did see the show twice in two different locations, but the first one is what I have the fondest memories of. The second one was just a bonus.

Not only that, the whole journey of going to see the shows required getting out of my comfort zone, meeting new people, trusting new people, speaking a foreign language, basically just doing a lot of what I’m not used to do. All of this made it one of the memorable trips I’ve ever made.

2. Philussy cake

Don’t you just love it when Dan publishes a picture that makes everyone lose their mind? Made my day at the job I hate a whole lot better. Also they ate the cake with Phil’s parents? Wish I were there to hear that conversation.

3. Living my truth

There might not be a lot to choose from when it comes to Dan’s main channel videos, but hey, we did get Living my truth and Giving the people what they want. Not bad. I chose Living my truth as the most memorable one, but it was a though choice. Dan’s oral kink will not be forgotten, and the jokes and the collective pride/fight/debate/call it what ever you want entertained me and warmed my heart a whole lot. This video was really a start of something new.

4. Entering the new era

Speaking of a start of something new… Nearing the end of the year, we didn’t get what we wanted - dapg went on hiatus and bye bye pinofs. I was half asleep when they announced all of this, and let’s just say I’ve never had such an efficient wake-up call.

There’s not a lot I can say about this yet. But because this list is based on the feelings the rats gave me, this was a big moment. I’m still a bit sad and unsure of what to make of this? While I’m in the middle of a big changes in my own life, I’d like to have something familiar to relax with. I feel like that something has been taken away from me and now this is just another big change. Maybe I’m being dramatic, but I’m so willing to see those bigger and better things they said are coming. They better.

5. Heartthrob

Look, I just love it.
